sentences.en: Annie grew up in comfort knowing little of the seamy side of life.
sentences.cn: 安妮在富裕安逸的环境中长大,不大知道生活的阴暗面.

sentences.en: He was the man who knew the seamy side of China, where the lice lurked.
sentences.cn: 而且我认为,许多在中国呆得比他更久的人也觉得他是个传奇式的人物.

sentences.en: How to solve psychological the seamy side?
sentences.cn: 怎样解决心理的阴暗面?

sentences.en: Human character has two sides, and everyone has his normal side and seamy side.
sentences.cn: 人的性格是有两面性的, 每个人都会有其性格的正常面和阴暗面.

sentences.en: John C . Reilly has played a host of seamy characters to great effect over the years.
sentences.cn: 约翰-C-雷利这些年来扮演了很多丑陋的角色,并大获成功.

sentences.en: Seamy The novel gives a vivid description of the seamy side of the city life.
sentences.cn: 这本小说生动地描绘了城市生活的阴暗面.

sentences.en: The novel gives a vivid description of the seamy side of city life.
sentences.cn: 这本小说生动地描绘了城市生活的背后面.

sentences.en: The place was loud, fast, and throbbing with life, some of it on the seamy side.
sentences.cn: 这儿喧闹 、 快节奏, 充满了生命的悸动, 但也有一些阴暗面.

sentences.en: the seamy side of the World Wide Web
To accept our seamy side, we must first admit that we are not perfect.
sentences.cn: 要接受自己的阴暗面, 就要首先承认自己是不完美的.

words.tran_cn: 无缝的；无缝合线的；无伤痕的
缝合；接合；使产生皱纹/伤痕；产生裂缝（原形seam）

trans.tran_cn: 丑恶的，污秽的，有线缝的，（生活等的）丑陋的一面
trans.tran_en: involving unpleasant things such as crime, violence, or immorality
